submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        n = len(nums)
        s, t = [0] * 100005, [0] * 100005
        for i in range(n//2):
            tm = abs(nums[i] - nums[n-i-1])
            a = max(max(nums[i], nums[n-i-1]), max(k-nums[i], k-nums[n-i-1]))
            if tm > a:
                s[0] += 1
                s[a + 1] += 1
                s[tm] -= 2
                s[tm+1] += 2
            else:   
                s[0] += 1
                s[tm] -= 1
                s[tm+1] += 1
                s[a+1] += 1
               

        pre, MIN = 0, 99999999
        for i in range(k+1):
            pre += s[i]
            MIN = min(MIN, pre)

        return MIN
